  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120245</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120245</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kateri vektor  predstavlja pospešek telesa?</string>
            <string language="en">Which vector represents the acceleration of the object?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welcher Vektor stellt die Beschleunigung der 
Nachricht dar?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quel vecteur représente l'accélération de 
l'objet ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que vetor representa o acceleration do objeto?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quale vettore rappresenta l'accelerazione 
dell'oggetto?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιο διάνυσμα αντιπροσωπεύει την ταχύτητα του 
αντικειμένου;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué vector representa la aceleración del 
objeto?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vozilo se začne premikati iz mirovanja in pospešuje po krožni poti.</string>
            <string language="en">Vehicle starts its movement and is accelerating along circular path.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vektor pospeška</string>
            <string language="en">acceleration vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krožno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtenje</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Träger beginnt seine Bewegung und beschleunigt entlang 
kreisförmigem Pfad.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le véhicule commence son mouvement et accélère le long 
de la voie d'accès circulaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O veículo começa seu movimento e está acelerando-o ao 
longo do trajeto circular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il veicolo inizia il relativo movimento e sta accelerare 
lungo il percorso circolare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το όχημα αρχίζει τη μετακίνησή του και επιταχύνει 
κατά μήκος του κυκλικού μονοπατιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El vehículo comienza su movimiento y está acelerando a 
lo largo del camino circular.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung Vektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteur d'accélération</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement circulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vetor do acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rotação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vettore di accelerazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento circolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάνυσμα ταχύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vector de la aceleración</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rotación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
